properties.body:
ADRIATIC SEA.
CROATIA TO ITALY.
9.5 METER S/V PAPILLON, WHITE HULL, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD,
UNREPORTED SALI (43-56N 015-10E) TO ANCONA (43-37N 013-31E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 390 6590 84527,
390 6590 84409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
390 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.ITBT.
